title: Comic Books - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/16/20
itunes:title: Comic Books - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/16/20
description:
George Noory and famed comic book artist Neal Adams discuss his career working on classic comic books like Batman, X-Men and Green Lantern, and how comic book artists today are gaining more creative freedom in the world than ever before.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
